description:
The Pastimers don’t have the minimum number of members necessary to be officially recognized as a club. They attempt to negotiate with the student council president, who isn’t impressed by the club’s activities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himatsubushi / Yuujou Game / Majo Saiban / Non-title Match
Killing Time / Friendship Game / The Witch Trials / Non-title Match
Passe-temps / Le jeu de l`amitié / Procès en sorcellerie / Rencontre amicale
